summary: Richie and Eddie, a perverted loser and his alcoholic partner in crime, run the worst hotel in Britain: the Guest House Paradiso.
cast: Rik Mayall|Adrian Edmondson|Bill Nighy|Kate Ashfield|Steven O'Donnell|Fenella Fielding|Charles Cartmell|Vincent Cassel|Hélène Mahieu|Paul Garcia|Sophia Myles|Emma Pierson|Anna Madeley|Simon Pegg|Lisa Palfrey|Joe Hughes|Jessica Mann|Richard Hammatt|James D'Arcy|Kate Loustau|Bob Mason|Phillip Lester|Richard Strange|David Sibley|Abbe Muschallik|Nina Muschallik
title: Hotel Paraíso
